IDEAL FOR BRAND CONSCIOUS ENTREPRENEURS, FREELANCERS, BLOGGERS AND PR PROFESSIONALS. (Or anyone with a passion or message they want to share)

The video revolution is not some distant event about to happen in the future, in fact it's already happenedâ€¦yesterday. And today it's in full bloom, exploding supersonic fast across the social media and web landscape.

IN THIS COURSE YOU WILL DISCOVER:

# Avoid the overwhelm with this step by step proven blueprint to becoming a prolific video content producer today.

# Simple tips to plan your video to save you hours and achieve fast results.

If you're not using online video you need to get moving now or you'll be left behind. Once you decide to take action and ride this wave the benefits to your brand are massive.

Online video not only boosts sales and increases your SEO ranking but has been shown to create a long-lasting and positive impression of your company, helping customers to understand and engage with your brand.

" this course brings us a complete playbook for success in this ever more popular medium of content creation."

Dave Thackeray - Communications Director/ UK Ambassador of European Podcast Award

BUT WHERE DO YOU START AND HOW?

It's expensive to hire a video production company and poor quality homemade videos can do more harm than good to your brand.

Busy professionals like yourself need a game-plan that they can implement fast.

This is a well-tested and trusted programme designed to give you a roadmap so you don't get lost or overwhelmed. A practical step by step blueprint to help you produce high-quality short videos for your website and social media platforms using tools you already have at your disposal.

The iPad and iPhone are ideal for getting your foot on the video content ladder. We'll give you simple tools and techniques so YOU can shoot amazing videos that will help give your brand a high end look and feel, as well as grow your army of followers.

"He actually makes this process look fun and easy. What I also appreciated is the exercise after each bit that helps you play around and to experience the specific part of video creation that you are learning about."

Erika Gombosova - Natural Woman Blog (NYC)

THIS COURSE IS IDEAL FOR:

For brand conscious entrepreneurs, freelancers, and bloggers who care about the look and feel of their brand. It's also ideal for PR Professionals, educators and students who want to get started on creating video content to populate their website and social media platforms.

If you're prepared to embrace a new mindset and take action this course will allow you to start producing eye-catching video content straight away and take your brand to new audiences worldwide.

Start your journey today and begin putting this game-plan into action, you may even have some fun along the way!
